Distribtion Center
attributes.description: Can stock is put together to become a complete aluminum can.  It is then filled with soft drink and shipped out to various locations around the nation.
Lots of Diesel fuel to transport to Newburgh.
attributes.title: Distribtion Center to Newburgh Walmart
Newburgh Walmart to My house
attributes.description: Gasoline to get aluminum cans from Walmart to home.
Once used.  Aluminum can, can be sent to the land fill.  Requires diesel to get it from home to there.
attributes.title: My house to Waste managment

attributes.description: Once used.  Aluminum can can be sent to a recycle center where can can be melted down and reused in other materials.  Requires diesel to get can from home to there.  This is still  a much better option than a landfill.
attributes.title: My house to (Disposal Option 2) Recycle center
Alcoa Operations to Distribtion Center
attributes.description: Lots of diesel is used to transport aluminum can stock from Alcoa to the Distribution center.
